column1: #Text=Do you always seem to cross paths with people who are stuck on themselves , intolerant of people different from them , rude or downright arrogant ?
#Text=These people can be a great source of potential pain , and this article is here to help you sort the arrogant from the not - so - arrogant .
#Text=Do n't eavesdrop , but when they 're talking to you or to those around you , listen to them .
#Text=Do they get mad or irritated if the centre of attention moves to someone else ?

#Text=Arrogance and smugness is often a reflection of limited life experience , and feeling concerned that those with greater life experience " Visit Tulsa . Understand the geography and culture of Tulsa . Learn about the arts , culture , and economy in Tulsa . Visit the Tulsa Convention Center or the Tulsa County Court House .
